name: PeckVoiceHosting
0:
”Alexa, open Peck Voice Hosting”
”What is voice hosting?”
”Alexa, ask Peck Voice Hosting how this will help my business”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peck voice hosting
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Peck is a publishing and hosting service for voice. It lets you easily create conversational voice apps that work on a variety of smart speaker devices.

Peck Voice Hosting answers some of your top questions about Peck and how to build voice apps. By talking to Peck Voice Hosting you also get to learn about the features of Peck. Because everything you hear in this action was built using Peck. So if you like what you hear, give Peck a try and build your own voice app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
